value.title: AI-powered brain implants help paralyzed patients communicate faster than ever

value.title: California deploys AI-powered wildfire detection systems
value.excerpt: The AI system processes "billions of megapixels" of images every minute from cameras that cover approximately 90 percent of California's fire-prone areas. The AI program started in June and was initially deployed in six of Cal Fire's command centers but will expand to all of Cal Fire's 21 command centers in September.
